abstract: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin talks with Yuri Milner, the chief executive of DST, who discusses the valuation of Facebook, and his stakes in other Internet companies.
snippet: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin talks with Yuri Milner, the chief executive of DST, who discusses the valuation of Facebook, and his stakes in other Internet companies.
lead_paragraph: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin talks with the man behind the Facebook deal, Yuri Milner, the chief executive of DST. Mr. Milner discusses the valuation of the social networking giant, and his stakes in other Internet companies.

headline.main: The Man Behind the Facebook Deal
